formalpara.title: Linker raw binary input crash fix
formalpara.para: A bug that caused the linker to crash when linking binary inputs (--format=binary) while using --gc-sections has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Assembler bug fixes
formalpara.para: Assembler bugs have been fixed that caused assembly errors or incorrect code to be produced for the LUI instruction, microMIPS B16, BEQZ16, and BNEZ16 suffixed instruction mnemonics, as well as 32-bit microMIPS instructions placed in a 16-bit delay slot of a branch or a jump.

formalpara.title: EVA instruction assembler bug fix
formalpara.para: An assembler bug in branch delay slot optimization involving EVA instructions has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Assembler %hi and %lo operator bug fixes
formalpara.para: Several bugs have been fixed in the handling of %hi and %lo assembly operators applied to expressions involving forward symbol references. The bugs caused the assembler to fail with a relocation overflow error message or to produce incorrect code.

formalpara.title: microMIPS SWXC1 instruction encoding bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the encoding of the microMIPS SWXC1 instruction has been fixed. The bug caused LWXC1 to be produced by the assembler and listed by the disassembler instead.

formalpara.title: Binutils version 2.23
formalpara.para: &csl_prod; for &csl_target_name; is now based on binutils version 2.23.

formalpara.title: Linker crash bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused the linker to crash when using customized linker scripts without a .eh_frame_hdr output section description.

formalpara.title: Linker assertion failure bug fix
formalpara.para: A linker bug has been fixed that caused assertion failures when processing code that makes use of protected symbols.

formalpara.title: Assembler internal error bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused the assembler to sometimes fail with a fixup not contained within frag error message. The bug was triggered by the branch delay slot optimization, not normally used for compiler-generated code.

formalpara.title: Linker _gp special symbol ABI conformance bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed in the linker that caused link errors or run-time malfunction of code that referred to the special _gp symbol. The semantics of the symbol has been defined in the MIPS processor-specific ABI supplement and the linker did not follow that definition.

formalpara.title: Linker script symbols
formalpara.para: The linker now supports a new HIDDEN keyword to define symbols with object scope. Refer to the linker manual for details.

formalpara.title: EVA support
formalpara.para: GAS now supports MIPS EVA instructions. You can specify the -meva option to GCC and GAS to indicate that EVA instructions are being used.

formalpara.title: Linker --gc-sections bug fix
formalpara.para: A linker bug that incorrectly caused undefined references to be diagnosed when the --gc-sections option is used has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Linker TLS bug fixed
formalpara.para: A linker bug in the handling of thread-local storage variables has been fixed. This bug caused the linker to emit an assertion failure message at bfd/elf32-sh.c:7396.

formalpara.title: Linker --gc-sections option bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused the linker to incorrectly remove the .debug_types section when using the --gc-sections option.

formalpara.title: Assembler bug fix
formalpara.para: The assembler no longer fails with an unsupported BFD relocation size 8 error message when processing .uaquad and .8byte directives.

formalpara.title: microMIPS PLT linker bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that sometimes caused the linker to emit MIPS32 code in the Procedure Linkage Table (PLT) in programs linked from pure microMIPS objects.

formalpara.title: Linker COMDAT optimization bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused linker errors with the --shared-comdat option.

formalpara.title: Fix for assembler internal error
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused the assembler to abort with an assertion failure in emit_inc_line_addr.

formalpara.title: Binutils version 2.21
formalpara.para: &csl_prod; for &csl_target_name; is now based on binutils version 2.21.

formalpara.title: Linker COMDAT group code size optimization
formalpara.para: The linker supports a new option -Wl,--shared-comdat that causes it to resolve COMDAT group symbols to definitions provided by shared libraries when possible, discarding any duplicate definitions of the group in relocatable files included in the link. This optimization can produce smaller C++ executables and shared libraries at the expense of additional runtime overhead.

formalpara.title: Support for pure microMIPS objects
formalpara.para: The assembler and linker now support generation of pure microMIPS objects, and the included microMIPS libraries now contain only microMIPS instructions.

formalpara.title: Binutils support for 32-bit microMIPS instructions
formalpara.para: The assembler and linker now support generation of 32-bit instructions only when making microMIPS code. For more information, refer to the documentation of the -minsn32 assembler option and the --insn32 linker option.

formalpara.title: Assembler crash
formalpara.para: The assembler now warns when there is line information for the *ABS* section, rather than crash. This can occur when the .offset directive is used incorrectly.

formalpara.title: microMIPS linker code size optimization bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that sometimes caused the linker to generate incorrect code when the --relax option is used to enable certain code size optimizations that make use of the ADDIUPC instruction.

formalpara.title: 24K Errata
formalpara.para:
The -mfix-24k assembler option has been extended to work around Errata E48: Lost Data on Stores During Refill.
In addition, GCC now accepts this command-line option and passes it through to the assembler.

formalpara.title: Addr2line bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused Addr2line to print ??:0 for any address instead of file and line number.

formalpara.title: microMIPS DSP ASE
formalpara.para: The assembler now supports microMIPS encodings for the DSP ASE instructions.

formalpara.title: Objdump fix for multiple input files
formalpara.para: The Objdump utility did not produce correct disassembly when processing multiple input files. This has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Thumb-2 assembler validation fix
formalpara.para: The assembler now correctly rejects Thumb-2 ADD, ADDS, SUB, and SUBS instructions that have an invalid shift operand. Previously, invalid shift values were accepted and generated unpredictable instructions.

formalpara.title: Improved MIPS16 and microMIPS library call support
formalpara.para: The toolchain now supports the use of MIPS16 and microMIPS code in the Procedure Linkage Table (PLT). The table is used to make shared library function calls from programs. The new feature allows smaller and faster code to be generated.

formalpara.title: microMIPS linker code size optimization bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that sometimes caused the linker to generate incorrect code when the --relax option is used to enable certain code size optimizations.

formalpara.title: MCU ASE instructions assembler bug fixes
formalpara.para: Bugs have been fixed that caused the assembler to sometimes generate incorrect code for the MCU ASE ACLR, ASET and IRET instructions.

formalpara.title: Linker debug information fix
formalpara.para: A bug in linker processing of debug information has been fixed. The bug sometimes prevented the &csl_sgxx; debugger from displaying source code if the executable was linked with the --gc-sections option.

formalpara.title: Absolute branch bug fixes
formalpara.para: A bug that caused the assembler to crash on a branch to an absolute address has been fixed. Linker handling of the resulting relocations has also been improved. Previously this caused an invalid switch to ARM mode on ARMv7-M devices.

formalpara.title: VMOV instruction bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug that caused the assembler to incorrectly reject certain valid immediate operands for the VMOV instruction has been fixed.

formalpara.title: COP2 instruction bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug in handling of the COP2 instruction's argument has been fixed in the assembler and disassembler.

formalpara.title: Linker bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the linker's handling of some multiply-defined symbols from shared libraries has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Fix for linker bug affecting C library
formalpara.para: A bug in the linker's handling of some thread-local symbols has been fixed. One of the manifestations of this problem was a segmentation fault in the __res_init EGLIBC function due to incorrect linking of such symbols in the C library.

formalpara.title: Assembler PC-relative store fix
formalpara.para: A bug that caused the assembler to reject some valid PC-relative store instructions has been fixed. It now issues a warning instead for architectures where these instructions are deprecated.

formalpara.title: Binutils update
formalpara.para: The binutils package has been updated to version 2.20.51.20100809 from the FSF trunk. This update includes numerous bug fixes.

formalpara.title: Improved linker diagnostic
formalpara.para: The linker now produces a less cryptic error message when a jump instruction that does not support interlinking is used to change modes.

formalpara.title: ARMv7-A linker bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the linker support for --fix-cortex-a8, which is enabled by default when linking ARMv7-A objects, has been fixed. Programs affected by the bug sometimes crashed with segmentation fault or illegal instruction errors.

formalpara.title: Smaller C++ programs with -g
formalpara.para: An assembler bug has been fixed that caused unnecessary references to exception-handling routines from C++ programs when debug information is enabled. For programs that do not otherwise use exceptions, this change results in smaller code size.

formalpara.title: Additional validation in the assembler
formalpara.para:
The assembler now diagnoses an error, instead of producing an invalid object file, when directives such as .hidden are missing operands.
The assembler now also issues errors about uses of lswi, lswx, stswi, and stswx on architectures where they are not supported.

formalpara.title: Fix for incorrect MIPS16 and microMIPS relocations
formalpara.para: An assembler bug has been fixed that caused incorrect relocation information to be produced for MIPS16 and microMIPS code, diagnosed by a Can't find matching LO16 reloc linker warning.

formalpara.title: &csl_target;-objcopy bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused &csl_target;-objcopy to enter an infinite loop when processing object files in non-ELF formats. The bug also affected &csl_target;-objdump.

formalpara.title: Archiver bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed in the ar utility, which sometimes caused it to produce unrecognizable 64-bit files. The bug also caused similar problems in the strip and objcopy utilities when processing 64-bit archives.

formalpara.title: Assembler PC-relative load fix
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that caused the assembler to reject some references to global symbols has been fixed. This bug affected Thumb instructions of the form ldr r0, symbol.

formalpara.title: Object file flags fix
formalpara.para: The objdump and readelf utilities have been updated to decode ISA-C and EMAC-B ELF header flags.

formalpara.title: Strip bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the strip and objcopy utilities, which resulted in stripped object files that the linker could not recognize, has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Linker bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug that caused the linker error relocation truncated to fit: R_ARM_THM_JUMP24 when linking some Thumb-2 applications has been fixed.

formalpara.title: ARM EABI 2.08
formalpara.para: The toolchain has been updated to implement ARM EABI 2.08 (October 2009).

formalpara.title: Linker bug with Cortex-A8 erratum fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the --fix-cortex-a8 linker option, which is enabled by default when linking ARMv7-A objects, has been fixed. The bug could cause the linker to generate incorrect shared libraries.

formalpara.title: Incorrect linker-generated functions
formalpara.para: A bug that caused some linker-generated functions (including stubs to support interworking from ARM mode to Thumb mode and stubs to implement long branches) to jump to invalid offsets has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Assembler encoding bug fixes
formalpara.para: Several bugs in the assembler have been fixed that caused selection of incorrect encodings for some instructions that have multiple encodings. The incorrect encodings are not believed to have affected runtime behavior but were not in conformance with the canonical encodings specified by the ARM ARM. The objdump command has also been fixed to decode such instructions correctly.

formalpara.title: Weak symbols
formalpara.para: An assembler bug has been fixed that caused incorrect code to be generated for references to weak symbols when a default definition is also provided in the same file.

formalpara.title: Long branch fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused the linker to generate ARM-mode instructions for long branches on ARM v6-M. The linker now generates Thumb instructions.

formalpara.title: Assembler segmentation fault fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused the assembler to crash when assembling some Thumb-only instructions in ARM mode. The assembler now gives an error on all incorrect uses of Thumb-only instructions in ARM mode.

formalpara.title: Linker script processing improvement
formalpara.para: The linker can now automatically place sections that are not mentioned in your linker script. Previously, it issued the error no memory region specified for loadable section.

formalpara.title: Linker bug fix for --section-start
formalpara.para: A linker bug that caused --section-start to fail to work as documented if the section is defined in multiple object files has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Linker performance improvement
formalpara.para: A bug in the linker that caused applications with many input files to link slowly has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Assembler segmentation fault fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused the assembler to crash when processing some data filling directives, such as .fill 0, 0, 0.

formalpara.title: Static constructor and destructor ordering fixes
formalpara.para: The linker now correctly ensures that static destructors with priorities are executed after destructors without priorities. Another linker bug that caused incorrect static constructor and destructor ordering with partial linking involved has been fixed.

formalpara.title: vcvt assembly bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug that caused vcvt.s32.f64 instructions to be misassembled as vcvtr.s32.f64 has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Assembler fix for Thumb-2
formalpara.para: A bug that caused the assembler to reject some valid Thumb-2 strexd instructions has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Branches between ARM and Thumb fix
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that caused incorrect branches between ARM and Thumb code in different sections has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Warning for deprecated instructions
formalpara.para: The assembler now issues warnings about uses of swp or swpb instructions on architectures where they have been deprecated.

formalpara.title: Additional error checks in the assembler
formalpara.para: The assembler now diagnoses additional invalid uses of the PC and SP registers, as specified in the ARM documentation. The assembler now also rejects invalid NEON alignment qualifiers, such as vld1.8 {d0}, [r0, :128] and vld1.8 {q0}, [r0, :256].

formalpara.title: Assembler segmentation fault fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused the assembler to crash when processing code containing invalid Thumb-mode instructions such as ldr r0, 0. The assembler now produces an error message in such cases.

formalpara.title: Linker fix for data-only sections
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused the linker to incorrectly mark parts of the output as containing code, rather than data, when linking data-only sections not explicitly tagged as such. The bug resulted in incorrect disassembly.

formalpara.title: Dynamic library unloading and destructor ordering
formalpara.para: A bug that caused dynamic libraries loaded with dlopen to remain loaded after calling dlclose to unload them, and thus their destructors be called in the incorrect order has been fixed.

formalpara.title: MIPS32 revision 2.61 SYNC instruction types
formalpara.para: Binary utilities have been extended to support additional SYNC instruction types introduced with revision 2.61 of the MIPS32 architecture specification.

formalpara.title: Improved assembler error checking
formalpara.para: The assembler has been improved to perform additional checks for invalid inputs.

formalpara.title: Assembler stldsr fix
formalpara.para: The assembler has been fixed to correctly accept stldsr instructions for ColdFire ISA_A+ processors.

formalpara.title: Disassembler bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the disassembler has been fixed that caused incorrect output for data objects, including literal pools and the interrupt vector.

formalpara.title: NEON assembler fix
formalpara.para: The assembler now correctly handles the three-operand form of NEON logic instructions, such as vorr.i32 q0, q0, #0xff

formalpara.title: Linker relocation diagnostics
formalpara.para: A bug that caused the linker to incorrectly diagnose overflows for some valid relocations has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Improved assembler error checking
formalpara.para: The assembler has been improved to perform additional checks for invalid inputs.

formalpara.title: Incorrect symbol addresses bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the linker that caused it to assign incorrect addresses to symbols has been fixed. The bug occurred when the input objects contained sections not explicitly mentioned in the linker script and was most likely to occur when building the Linux kernel.

formalpara.title: ELF Program Headers
formalpara.para: The linker now better diagnoses errors in the usage of FILEHDR and PHDRS keywords in PHDRS command of linker scripts. Refer to the linker manual for more information.

formalpara.title: ELF file corruption with strip
formalpara.para: A bug that caused strip to corrupt unusual ELF files has been fixed.

formalpara.title: ARM VFP assembler bug fix
formalpara.para: The assembler now correctly assembles the vmls, vnmla and vnmls mnemonics. Previously these were incorrectly assembled to different instructions.

formalpara.title: ARM Cortex-R4F assembler bug fix
formalpara.para: The assembler now correctly recognizes the -mcpu=cortex-r4f command-line option to select the Cortex-R4F processor.

formalpara.title: VFP assembly mnemonics
formalpara.para: The assembler now accepts unified assembly mnemonics for VFP instructions (e.g. VADD.f32 s0, s0) in legacy syntax mode.

formalpara.title: Assembler validations fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the assembler that caused some addw and subw instructions with SP or PC as operand to be wrongly rejected has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Linker failure with Cortex-A8 erratum fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the --fix-cortex-a8 linker option has been fixed. The bug caused the linker either to produce a bad value error, or to silently generate an incorrect executable.

formalpara.title: Linker map address sorting
formalpara.para: The map generated by the linker -Map option now lists symbols sorted by address.

formalpara.title: Binutils update
formalpara.para: The binutils package has been updated to version 2.19.51.20090709 from the FSF trunk. This update includes numerous bug fixes.

formalpara.title: Assembler fix
formalpara.para: The assembler now correctly diagnoses a missing operand to bl and blx instructions. Previously, incorrect code was silently generated.

formalpara.title: Linker fix
formalpara.para: The linker now correctly processes references to undefined local symbols. Such references are treated the same as references to undefined global symbols. Usually object files contain no such references, as they can never be satisfied.

formalpara.title: Internal error in assembler
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that caused an internal error when .thumb or .arm appears after an invalid instruction has been fixed.

formalpara.title: New assembler directive .inst
formalpara.para: The assembler now accepts the new .inst directive to generate an instruction from its integer encoding.

formalpara.title: Assembler validation improvements
formalpara.para: The assembler now issues a warning when a section finishes with an unclosed IT instruction block at the end of the input file. It also now rejects unwinding directives that appear outside of a .fnstart/.fnend pair. Additionally, 32-bit Thumb instructions are now correctly rejected when assembling for cores that do not support these instructions.

formalpara.title: Archiver fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the ar archiver has been fixed. This bug caused archive element manipulation to fail on Solaris hosts with an error indicating the archive is invalid.

formalpara.title: -mauto-it assembler option replaced with -mimplicit-it
formalpara.para: The -mauto-it command-line option to the assembler has been replaced with a more general -mimplicit-it option to control the behavior of the assembler when conditional instructions appear outside an IT instruction block. If you were previously using -mauto-it, you should now use -mimplicit-it=always. Other -mimplicit-it modes allow you to separately control implicit IT instruction insertion behavior in ARM and Thumb-2 code. For more information, refer to the assembler manual. In addition to renaming the option, a number of bugs in the implicit IT generation have been fixed.

formalpara.title: Incorrect linker diagnostic removed
formalpara.para: The linker has been corrected to not emit an error message when the load address of an output section with no contents overlaps an output section with contents. This can occur in linker scripts that use MEMORY regions and AT> to place initialized contents into ROM.

formalpara.title: Assembler fix for mixed Thumb and ARM mode
formalpara.para: A bug in the assembler has been fixed where mapping symbols were sometimes incorrectly placed at section boundaries. This could lead to incorrect disassembly in some cases.

formalpara.title: Linking objects built without -fPIC into shared libraries
formalpara.para: The linker now gives an error for attempts to link object files built without -fPIC or -fpic into shared libraries when those objects use the ARMv7 MOVW and MOVT instructions in ways that are unsafe in a shared library. Previously it built a shared library that behaved incorrectly when used.

formalpara.title: Linker bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug that caused the linker to crash when .ARM.exidx sections were discarded by a linker script has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Overlay sections
formalpara.para: &csl_target;-readelf now correctly recognizes section headers for ARM_DEBUGOVERLAY and ARM_OVERLAYSECTION sections.

formalpara.title: Assembler bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the assembler that caused duplicate and missing mapping symbols has been fixed. The bug caused incorrect objdump output and incorrect byte-swapping for BE8 configurations.

formalpara.title: Incorrect placement of linker-generated functions
formalpara.para: A bug that caused some linker-generated functions (including stubs to support interworking from ARM mode to Thumb mode and stubs to avoid processor errata) to be placed in data sections has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Assembler floating-point format
formalpara.para: The assembler now defaults to VFP format for floating-point numbers. It previously defaulted to the legacy FPA format if no -mcpu or -march option was specified, or if a CPU with no floating-point unit was specified. This bug resulted in incorrect behavior of the .double and .dcb.d directives.

formalpara.title: New option for automatically generating IT blocks
formalpara.para: The assembler now allows use of conditional Thumb-2 instructions without requiring explicit IT instructions. Use the -mauto-it command-line option to enable this automatic generation of IT instructions.

formalpara.title: Linker crash with very large applications
formalpara.para: A linker bug that caused a crash when linking very large applications with the --fix-cortex-a8 command-line option has been fixed.

formalpara.title: tlbilx encoding fix
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that resulted in an incorrect encoding of the tlbilx instruction and its extended mnemonics tlbilxlpid, tlbilxpid, and tlbilxva has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Maximum code alignment increased
formalpara.para: The maximum allowed code alignment has been increased from 32 to 64 bytes. This change affects the .p2align and .align assembler directives and the -falign-functions GCC option.

formalpara.title: Linker script search path
formalpara.para: The bug in the linker has been fixed that caused it not to follow its documented behavior for searching for linker scripts named with the -T option. Now scripts are looked up first in the current directory, then in library directories specified with -L command-line options, and finally in the default system linker script directory.

formalpara.title: &csl_target;-objcopy bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused &csl_target;-objcopy to issue an error when generating output in the Intel HEX format and using --change-section-lma to change section addresses.

formalpara.title: Cortex-A8 erratum workaround enabled for ARMv7-A
formalpara.para: The workaround for the erratum in Cortex-A8 processors mentioned below is now enabled by default if you are targeting the ARMv7-A architecture profile. The workaround can be disabled by passing the --no-fix-cortex-a8 option to the linker.

formalpara.title: Linker script load address processing
formalpara.para: A bug in the linker has been fixed affecting linker scripts using AT>region to set the load address. This now follows the documented behavior of maintaining the virtual address to load address difference in output section statements. Refer to the "Output Section LMA" section of the linker manual for details of how to control the load address.

formalpara.title: Stack backtracing and C++ exception handling
formalpara.para: Improvements have been made to the linker in support of C++ runtime exception handling and stack backtracing. A problem that caused crashes during the backtrace of C routines that were not compiled with the -fexceptions option has been fixed. In addition, the linker generates more compact stack unwinding tables which can lead to smaller executables.

formalpara.title: Disassembler bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused incorrect disassembly of some object files with multiple sections whose symbol tables included symbols in the middle of functions. These typically resulted from hand-written assembly.

formalpara.title: ARM EABI attributes
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that resulted in some object files generated from hand-written assembly being incorrectly tagged as using VFP instructions has been fixed. This tagging was harmless for objects linked with &csl_sgxx; tools and libraries, but may have affected third-party tools and libraries.

formalpara.title: Erratum workaround for Cortex-A8 processors
formalpara.para: The linker now implements a workaround for an erratum in Cortex-A8 processors. If you are targeting an affected part and wish to use the workaround, pass the --fix-cortex-a8 option to the linker. Please contact ARM for further details of the erratum.

formalpara.title: Assembler diagnostics for invalid instructions
formalpara.para: The assembler now issues diagnostics for invalid ADR and ADRL instructions. Formerly, these invalid instructions were silently mis-assembled. This assembler bug did not affect correct code.

formalpara.title: Incorrect linker-generated functions
formalpara.para: A bug that caused some linker-generated functions (such as stubs to support interworking from ARM mode to Thumb mode) to contain only nop instructions instead of correct code sequences has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Extraneous linker error messages
formalpara.para: A linker bug that caused extraneous error messages of the form Dwarf Error: Offset (507) greater than or equal to .debug_str size (421). has been corrected. This bug did not affect the correctness of output binaries.

formalpara.title: &csl_target;-objdump bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused &csl_target;-objdump to enter an infinite loop.

formalpara.title: Assembler marking of data
formalpara.para: Data generated using the assembler directives .ascii, .asciz, .dc.d, .dc.s, .dc.x, .dcb, .dcb.b, .dcb.d, .dcb.l, .dcb.s, .dcb.w, .dcb.x, .ds, .ds.b, .ds.d, .ds.l, .ds.p, .ds.s, .ds.w, .ds.x, .double, .fill, .float, .incbin, .single, .space, .skip, .string, .string8, .string16, .string32, .string64, and .zero is now correctly marked by the assembler as data rather than code. This fixes incorrect byte-swapping of such data when linking for BE8 configurations.

formalpara.title: DMB, DSB, and ISB instructions on ARMv6-M
formalpara.para: The assembler now accepts the DMB, DSB, and ISB instructions on ARMv6-M CPUs, including Cortex-M0 and Cortex-M1. These instructions were incorrectly rejected on these CPUs in previous releases.

formalpara.title: CMP Thumb-2 instruction
formalpara.para: The assembler no longer issues an error about CMP instructions in which the second argument is the stack pointer (r13), as these are valid instructions. However, use of the stack pointer in this context is deprecated in the current ARM architecture specification and the assembler now warns about the deprecated use.

formalpara.title: Improved NOP generation for Thumb-2 cores
formalpara.para: The assembler now generates Thumb-2/ARMv6K architectural NOP instructions when alignment padding is required in code sections.

formalpara.title: New assembler option: -mfix-24k
formalpara.para: The assembler now accepts the -mfix-24k command-line option. The use of this option causes the assembler to work around hardware errata in the eret and deret instructions on 24K and 24KE cores.

formalpara.title: &csl_target;-objcopy and &csl_target;-strip bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused &csl_target;-objcopy and &csl_target;-strip to corrupt prelinked binaries.

formalpara.title: Binutils update
formalpara.para: The binutils package has been updated to version 2.19.51.20090205 from the FSF trunk. This update includes numerous bug fixes.

formalpara.title: ARM build attributes conformance improvements
formalpara.para: Several ARM EABI 2.07 conformance issues relating to the handling of build attributes in the assembler and linker have been fixed. All build attribute types are now recognized, and can now be declared by name, in addition to by number. Support for merging attributes in the linker has been improved, and the linking of incompatible objects is now detected and rejected in more cases.

formalpara.title: Linker errors on non-ELF input
formalpara.para: A bug has been fixed that caused internal errors from the linker when linking non-ELF input files (with the -b or --format linker options).

formalpara.title: Linker crash on incompatible input files
formalpara.para: Some third-party compilers, including ARM RealView 4.0, produce a build attribute marking output files that are not compatible with the ABI for the ARM Architecture. This attribute sometimes caused the linker to crash. The linker now correctly issues an error message.

formalpara.title: Undefined weak references in shared libraries
formalpara.para:
A linker bug has been fixed affecting calls from Thumb code in shared libraries to functions that are undefined weak references when the shared library is linked. Such calls executed as nops whether or not the functions were defined at run time.
This affected thread-related code in the Thumb-2 versions of the standard C++ library provided with &csl_sgxx;, causing some multithreaded C++ programs to crash.

formalpara.title: Bug fix for assembly listing
formalpara.para: A bug that caused the assembler to produce corrupted listings (via the -a option) on Windows hosts has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Mixed-case NEON register aliases
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that prevented NEON register aliases from being created with mixed-case names using the .dn and .qn directives has been fixed. Previously only aliases created with all-lowercase or all-uppercase names worked correctly.

formalpara.title: Bug fix for objcopy/strip
formalpara.para: An objcopy bug that corrupted COMDAT groups when creating new binaries has been fixed. This bug also affected strip -g.

formalpara.title: Thumb-2 assembler fixes
formalpara.para: The Thumb-2 encodings of QADD, QDADD, QSUB, and QDSUB have been corrected. Previous versions of the assembler generated incorrect object files for these instructions. The assembler now accepts the ORN, QASX, QSAX, RRX, SHASX, SHSAX, SSAX, USAX, UHASX, UQSAX, and USAX mnemonics. The assembler now detects and issues errors for invalid uses of register 13 (the stack pointer) and register 15 (the program counter) in many instructions.

formalpara.title: Binutils support for DWARF Version 3
formalpara.para: The addr2line command now supports binaries containing DWARF 3 debugging information. The ld command can display error messages with source locations for input files containing DWARF 3 debugging information.

formalpara.title: Bug fix for objdump on Windows
formalpara.para: An objdump bug that caused the -S option not to work on Windows in some cases has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Unnecessary section removed
formalpara.para: A linker bug that caused an unnecessary .rel.dyn section to be placed in the executable has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Linker bug fix for --gc-sections
formalpara.para: A linker bug that caused certain linker-generated sections to be incorrectly omitted from the executable when the --gc-sections option is used has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Linker bug affecting Library Reduction Utility
formalpara.para: A linker bug has been fixed that caused the &csl_target;-mklibs Library Reduction Utility to produce invalid output when relinking libc.so. The bug could also affect linking of other shared libraries containing weak undefined symbols with non-default visibility.

formalpara.title: "Can't find matching LO16" linker error fixed
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that caused errors when linking files containing mixed MIPS16 and non-MIPS16 code has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Thumb-2 MUL encoding
formalpara.para: In Thumb-2 mode, the assembler now encodes MUL as a 16-bit instruction (rather than as a 32-bit instruction) when possible. This fix results in smaller code, with no loss of performance.

formalpara.title: Thumb-2 RBIT encoding
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that resulted in incorrect encoding of the Thumb-2 RBIT instruction has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Uppercase operands to IT instructions
formalpara.para: The assembler now accepts both uppercase and lowercase operands for the IT family of instructions.

formalpara.title: ARMv7 offset out of range errors
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that resulted in offset out of range errors when compiling for ARMv7 processors has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Symbian binary relocation
formalpara.para: The linker now correctly generates relocations for writable data as data-relative rather than text-relative. The former behavior caused runtime failures accessing writable data.

formalpara.title: Placing bss-like regions in load regions
formalpara.para: The linker no longer issues an incorrect error message when a bss-like section is placed at specific load region. The linker formerly incorrectly considered the section as taking up space in the load region.

formalpara.title: NEON assembler symbols
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that caused spurious undefined symbols to be generated has been fixed. The mov d0, d1 instruction would incorrectly cause an undefined symbol d1 to be created.

formalpara.title: MIPS local GOT space
formalpara.para: A linker bug that caused the error "not enough GOT space for local GOT entries" has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Binutils update
formalpara.para: The binutils package has been updated to version 2.18.50.20080215 from the FSF trunk. This update includes numerous bug fixes.

formalpara.title: ColdFire multi-GOT support
formalpara.para: On ColdFire GNU/Linux targets, the linker now supports generation of multiple GOTs. This change avoids certain "relocation truncated to fit" linker errors, which sometimes resulted when linking large PIC object files such as shared libraries. For additional information, refer to the --got=type option in the linker documentation.

formalpara.title: Disassembler bug fix
formalpara.para: A bug in the disassembler has been fixed that formerly caused objdump to crash when processing raw binary files, or other executables with an empty symbol table.

formalpara.title: MOVW and MOVT relocations
formalpara.para: A linker error that resulted in incorrect offsets when processing relocations on MOVW and MOVT instructions referencing mergeable string sections has been fixed.

formalpara.title: New Octeon instructions
formalpara.para: The assembler now supports the Cavium Octeon instructions saa and saad.

formalpara.title: Linker error allocating ELF segments
formalpara.para: A bug where the linker produces an incorrect error message with segments at the top of the address space has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Invalid object file after strip
formalpara.para: A bug in the assembler has been fixed that formerly caused .set symbol expression constructs to emit symbol in the wrong section. This in turn caused inconsistent behavior after stripping the symbol table.

formalpara.title: Linker crash on invalid input files
formalpara.para: Some older versions of GCC generated object files with invalid mergeable string sections when compiling with -fmerge-all-constants. This bug was fixed in &csl_sgxx; as of version 4.1-43. However, since system libraries included with some GNU/Linux distributions were affected by this bug, the linker has now been changed to accept object files with such invalid sections, rather than crash or produce an error message.

formalpara.title: Overlapping operands for long multiply instructions
formalpara.para: An incorrect assembler warning has been removed in the case of overlapping source and destination operands for UMULL, SMULL, UMLAL and SMLAL instructions on ARMv6 processors.

formalpara.title: &csl_target;-objcopy and &csl_target;-strip on prelinked binaries
formalpara.para: A bug causing errors from &csl_target;-objcopy and &csl_target;-strip on prelinked binaries has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Disassembly of %sr and %ccr move instructions
formalpara.para: Disassembly now correctly handles instructions that move a constant to the %sr or %ccr registers.

formalpara.title: Windows resource compiler
formalpara.para: Several problems related to reading and processing .rc or .res files with windres have been fixed.

formalpara.title: Linker errors for large programs
formalpara.para: A bug causing linker errors for some programs using many dynamic symbols has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Incorrect jalr operands
formalpara.para: The assembler now reports an error if identical source and destination registers are specified for the jalr instruction.

formalpara.title: Support for large alignment values
formalpara.para: The assembler .align directive and GCC aligned attribute both now accept alignments up to 2^28 bytes.

formalpara.title: Linker errors for large programs
formalpara.para: A bug causing linker errors for some programs with hundreds of megabytes of statically-allocated data has been fixed.

formalpara.title: ColdFire 51QE processor support
formalpara.para: &csl_sgxx; now supports Freescale ColdFire 51QE processor. You can specify the -mcpu=51qe option to GCC and GAS to generate code for this processor.

formalpara.title: Loongson-2E and Loongson-2F processor support
formalpara.para: The binutils package now supports the ST Microelectronics Loongson-2E processor and has preliminary support for the Loongson-2F. To assemble for these processors, invoke the assembler with -march=loongson2e or -march=loongson2f as appropriate.

formalpara.title: Binutils update
formalpara.para: The binutils package has been updated to the 2007-08-19 version of the pre-2.18 FSF trunk. This contains many new improvements and bug fixes. For more information, refer to the manuals for the individual utilities, and to the binutils web site at http://www.gnu.org/software/binutils/.

formalpara.title: Improved diagnostics for region overflow
formalpara.para: The linker will now give more helpful diagnostics when the object files being linked are too big for one of the memory regions defined in the linker script.

formalpara.title: ABI markings for MIPS binaries
formalpara.para: GCC and Binutils now mark MIPS binaries according to their floating point calling convention. The linker reads this information and warns when mismatched object files are linked together. For example, the linker warns if -msoft-float objects are linked to a -mhard-float C library. GDB uses the same information to correctly call functions from the command line and display return values after finish.

formalpara.title: C++ exception handling with relocatable links
formalpara.para: A defect in relocatable linking (&csl_target;-ld -r) of C++ programs using exception handling has been fixed. Such programs formerly appeared to link correctly, but handlers established by try/catch blocks failed to execute.

formalpara.title: movec instruction
formalpara.para: The assembler now accepts %mbo for Memory Base Offset register in the movec instruction. %mbb continues to be accepted as a synonym of %mbo for backward compatibility.

formalpara.title: Calls to undefined weak symbols
formalpara.para: The linker now implements semantics that comply to the ARM EABI for R_ARM_CALL and T_ARM_THM_CALL relocations against undefined weak symbols. These now result in a jump to the next instruction.

formalpara.title: NEON coprocessor system registers
formalpara.para: The assembler now accepts the MVFR0 and MVFR1 coprocessor registers in fmrx and fmxr instructions.

formalpara.title: EABI object attribute merging
formalpara.para: The linker now properly merges EABI object attributes into its output file.

formalpara.title: Thumb-2 shift instruction aliases
formalpara.para: The assembler now accepts mov with shifted operands as an alias for Thumb-2 shift instructions. For example mov r0, r1, lsl r2 is encoded as lsl r0, r1, r2.

formalpara.title: Coprocessor instructions
formalpara.para: Support has been added for ColdFire coprocessor instructions.

formalpara.title: Thumb-2 doubleword writeback addressing modes
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that caused writeback addressing modes for ldrd and strd to be incorrectly encoded has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Assembler skipping \ characters
formalpara.para: A bug is fixed where the assembler would skip \ characters when they appeared at certain positions in the input file. This bug primarily affected assembler macros.

formalpara.title: Thumb-2 exception return instructions
formalpara.para: An assembler bug that caused subs pc, lr, #const and movs pc, lr to be incorrectly encoded has been fixed.

formalpara.title: MIPS .set directives
formalpara.para: The assembler now accepts .set symbol,value directives in addition to MIPS-specific uses of .set.

formalpara.title: Thumb-2 branches to shared libraries
formalpara.para: The linker can now generate PLT stubs for R_ARM_THM_JUMP24 and R_ARM_THM_JUMP19 relocations. This occurs when Thumb-2 branch instructions refer to symbols imported from shared libraries.

formalpara.title: Uppercase special register names
formalpara.para: The assembler now accepts both uppercase and lowercase special register names when assembling msr and mrs instructions for the Microcontroller profile of the ARM Architecture.

formalpara.title: ColdFire wdebug.l instructions
formalpara.para: The assembler now correctly recognizes wdebug.l mnemonics. Previously only wdebug variants were allowed.

formalpara.title: ARM EABI compliance
formalpara.para: Objects produced by &csl_sgxx; are now marked as ARM ELF version 5 rather than ARM ELF version 4. This reflects compliance with recent revisions of the ARM EABI. &csl_sgxx; still accepts objects marked with version 4.

formalpara.title: Conditional Thumb-2 branch instructions
formalpara.para: A linker bug that could cause objects involving conditional Thumb-2 branch instructions to be incorrectly rejected has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Linking of non-ELF images
formalpara.para: A linker bug that could cause a crash when linking non-ELF objects for ARM targets has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Improved assembler diagnostics for 8-bit offsets
formalpara.para: The assembler now correctly diagnoses out-of-range offsets to instructions such as LDRD as 8-bit rather than half-word offsets.

formalpara.title: The \@ assembler pseudo-variable
formalpara.para: A bug in the assembler that caused uses of the \@ pseudo-variable to be mis-parsed as comments has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Binutils update
formalpara.para: The binutils package has been updated from version 2.17 to the pre-2.18 FSF trunk. This is a significant update with many improvements and bug fixes.

para:
Changes to the assembler (as) include:
On MIPS targets, support for additional processors and the SmartMIPS and DSP Release 2 extensions has been added.

New linker (ld) features include:
A new command-line option --default-script has been added to give more precise control over linker script processing.
There are new command-line options -Bsymbolic-functions, --dynamic-list, --dynamic-list-cpp-new, and --dynamic-list-data to control symbols that should be dynamically linked.
The new --print-gc-sections option lists sections removed by garbage collection.

Other changes include:
The objcopy utility has a new --extract-symbol option to extract only symbol table information from the input file.
The gprof utility now allows input files to have histogram records for several memory ranges, provided those ranges are disjoint.
For more information, refer to the manuals for the individual utilities, and the binutils web site at http://www.gnu.org/software/binutils/.
